item.title: Watch live: Trump addresses House Republican conference in Florida
item.description: President Donald Trump's remarks at the House Republican conference dinner come one week after he succeeded Joe Biden as president.

item.title: CDC ordered to stop working with WHO immediately, upending expectations of an extended withdrawal
item.description: The sudden stoppage would set back efforts to stop outbreaks of Marburg virus and mpox in Africa, as well as other threats around the world.

item.title: DOJ fires officials involved in Trump prosecutions by special counsel Jack Smith
item.description: President Donald Trump had been charged with crimes by special counsel Jack Smith in cases related to the 2020 election and classified documents.

item.title: Trump plans executive orders on military related to DEI, transgender troops and vaccines
item.description: President Donald Trump already signed a flurry of executive orders aimed to reshape U.S. policy on trade, immigration and citizenship, federal hiring ...

item.title: U.S. and Colombia reach deal on deportations; tariffs and sanctions put on hold
item.description: The U.S. and Colombia pulled back from the brink of a trade war on Sunday after the South American nation agreed to accept aircraft carrying deported ...
